data.message: Fix UserPromptSubmit hook error - relative path bug in config_loader.py: Fixed config_loader.py to use Path.home() / '.claude' instead of relative '.claude' path. Hook errors eliminated. All enforcement rules working: git push --force blocked, rm -rf / blocked, read-before-edit enforced.
data.task: Fix UserPromptSubmit hook error - relative path bug in config_loader.py
data.outcome: Fixed config_loader.py to use Path.home() / '.claude' instead of relative '.claude' path. Hook errors eliminated. All enforcement rules working: git push --force blocked, rm -rf / blocked, read-before-edit enforced.
